answers.answer: I'm getting induced tomorrow I'm 38 weeks and 6 days. The reason I'm getting induced is because I'm already 4cm dilated and 100% effaced.

My doctor induced me at 1/2 dilated.. but did it cause I was so huge and she knew how uncomfortable I was cause how small I was ... but when I got there thank god she did cause my son was all wrapped up in the cord around his neck in stuff every time they lay me on my right side he stopped breathing they rushed me into c section.  So I wasblessed  she induced me when she did

ileannarenee,  you might want to ask your doctor again why you are getting induced.  If you are 38 weeks, 6 days,  4 cm and 100% effaced that is actually a reason not to induce.  You're practically in labor.Can you ask your health provider again why you are being induced?  (It may be because there are health conditions you have that you haven't mentioned in your post.)
I was going to be induced at 38wks due to preeclamplsia and not wanting my bp to go any higher but I became seriously ill at 35wks so they just did a csection then.
I went over my due date by five days  I was almost 41 weeks
Im getimg imdiced in 2 days when im 41 weeks i think bc im not dilated at all
I was induced at 37 weeks when my blood pressure was going up in minutes and had a very high level of protein in my urine. I was right on the verge of preeclampsia.
